snippet.title: Smoke and Sacrifice Coming To PC & Nintendo Switch  On May 31st 2018
snippet.description:
Hand-Illustrated, Narrative-Driven Survival RPG ‘Smoke and Sacrifice’ Coming To PC & Nintendo Switch™ On May 31st 2018

Taking cues from modern survival classics, Smoke and Sacrifice evolves the genre with its deeply personal story and complex ecosystem. Creatures forage, mate, breed and prey on one another, creating a living world. Only by taming the game’s wilds can Sachi hope to unravel the mystery at the heart of Smoke and Sacrifice. 

Smoke and Sacrifice will launch on May 31st 2018 for PC and Nintendo Switch for £19.99 / $24.99 / €24.99 with a 20% discount for its first 2 weeks of sale. PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions will follow in 2018.

Add to your Steam Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/695100/Smoke_and_Sacrifice/
